title: Create a Virtual Tour
description: To enhance a listing's marketing, an agent wants to create a 3D virtual tour.

tasks.description: Schedule a 3D camera operator (e.g., Matterport provider) to scan the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books a vendor to create the tour.

tasks.description: Receive the completed virtual tour link from the vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the URL for the virtual tour.

tasks.description: Add the virtual tour link to the MLS listing and other marketing materials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the listing with the new tour.
